TopicTitle: My key board isn't working while in ksp

Articles.Content: So basically today i just went on KSP and whenever i would press any button on my keyboard (Mac keyboard)  it just makes a sound and it doesn't respond to anything in KSP like rotating parts and i've tried uninstalling KSP and restarting my computer but nothing works i really need help because i want to play KSP. and im on version 11.1 on mac latest version.
